vclaim: As transcribed by her granddaughter, U.S. Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg said: "My most fervent wish is that I will not be replaced until a new president is installed."
title: Did Ginsburg Say Her ‘Most Fervent Wish’ Was Not To Be Replaced by Trump?
subtitle: The U.S. Supreme Court justice dictated a message to her granddaughter shortly before she died.
author: Dan Evon
